title: The Lowest Form of Conversation with Reese Cooper
description:
Go head and light your varsity jacket on fire because this week we are dialing in the founder and creative director of Reese Cooper Inc., the man himself, Reese Cooper for some prodigal ass podding. Reese is tapping in with The Only Podcast That Matters™ to talk pearl necklaces, his age, turning down investment, bricking his first ever women’s collection, the politics of retail, interning at BAPE, American vs. European respect, celebrity cosigns, backstage runway drama, DIY, whipping Lime Scooters, first dates and much more.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
